data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Nagoya's Ryogo Yamasaki gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 1, Sapporo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 2, Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 4, Sapporo's Takuro Kaneko breaks free at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
Throw-in for Sapporo at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
At Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium, Sapporo are penalized for being offside.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Naoki Maeda for Nagoya drives towards goal at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 10, Nagoya take a 1-0 lead thanks to Ryogo Yamasaki.
In the minute 12, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Sapporo.
In Nagoya Nagoya drive forward through Mateus. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Nagoya are coming forward and Mateus gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Nagoya.
Sho Inagaki of Nagoya gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 16, Yudai Yamamoto awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the home team a throw-in.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Nagoya throw-in in Sapporo's half.
In the minute 29, In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Sapporo advance rapidly upfield but Yudai Yamamoto blows for offside.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
In Nagoya, Shinnosuke Nakatani (Nagoya) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Sapporo.
Free kick Nagoya.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 38, Yudai Yamamoto awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Sapporo.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Nagoya.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Sapporo at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
Yudai Yamamoto blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Goal! Mateus extends Nagoya's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sapporo close to the penalty box.
Tomoki Takamine is replacing Akito Fukumori for the away team.
Michael Petrovic is making the team's second substitution at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium with Douglas replacing Hiroki Miyazawa.
Sapporo's Lucas Fernandes misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Nagoya.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 51, Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Sapporo.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Nagoya are pushing forward but Naoki Maeda's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a throw-in for Nagoya, close to Sapporo's area.
In the minute 59, Gabriel Xavier is replacing Hiroyuki Abe for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The home team have replaced Naoki Maeda with Yuki Soma. This is the second substitution made today by Massimo Ficcadenti.
In the minute 60, At Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium, Yuki Soma has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Sapporo a goal kick.
In Nagoya, Daiki Suga (Sapporo) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 67, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Sapporo.
Important block from the Nagoya defence as Daiki Suga fires in a strike for Sapporo.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 69, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ryota Hayasaka is on a sub for Takuro Kaneko for Sapporo.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 72, Attention is being given to Nagoya’s Gabriel Xavier and play has been suspended briefly.
Free kick Nagoya.
Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a third substitution, with Mu Kanazaki replacing Gabriel Xavier.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Nagoya.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
In the minute 77, Can Nagoya capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sapporo's half?
Yuki Soma for Nagoya drives towards goal at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Nagoya take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Sho Inagaki.
In the minute 79, Great play from Mateus to set up the goal.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Lucas Fernandes with Kosuke Shirai. This is the fourth substitution made today by Michael Petrovic.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Yudai Yamamoto awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 85, Shunta Tanaka is booked for the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Nagoya.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 89, Can Sapporo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Sapporo have a dangerous throw-in.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Sapporo throw-in in Nagoya's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Full-time! The final score is 3-0.
The home team replace Ryogo Yamasaki with Haruya Fujii.
Kim Min-Tae (Sapporo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
